name: Eye of Ozem
prereq: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; Expert In Perception
summary: Learn how to better spot danger at a distance.
description:
You’ve learned how to spot danger at a distance, allowing you to serve as a sentry with ease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls when using Perception, and when you’re Scouting, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus instead of +1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
